attributes.action: Jail Anyone Physically Violent Towards Another Person
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Young people are attacked daily/weekly in this country and sadly some attacks end up fatal.  The attacks that don't end up fatal get brushed off as assault and the attacker gets a caution.  One punch can kill someone.  One knife in the wrong place at the wrong time can be used to kill someone.  Send ANYONE physically violent towards another person to jail.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
